law.catch_line: Caseload limitations for speech-language pathologists in the public schools.

text.section: The caseload limitations for speech-language pathologists in the public schools shall not exceed sixty-five (65) pupils.

The total caseload of speech-language pathologists who supervise assistants may be increased by no more than one-half (1/2) of the amount set forth in subsection (1) of this section for each speech-language pathology assistant working under their supervision.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 375, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 219, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
